citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
On January 30th, 2025, during a thoracotomy of a pig (ID# OH-PF-8544) in study, the skin layer was closed by a medical
student. A person not appropriately qualified and trained on that procedure. There was no evidence that the pig was
adversely affected.
Persons, not appropriately qualified and trained, performing procedures on animals maintained and studied by registrants
can cause harm or death.
Persons performing procedures on animals being maintained and studied must be appropriately qualified and trained.
To be corrected: September 8th, 2025, and going forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(viii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
On January 30th, 2025, during a thoracotomy of a pig (ID# OH-PF-8544) in study, the skin layer was closed by a medical 
student. A person not appropriately qualified and trained on that procedure. There was no evidence that the pig was 
adversely affected.  
Persons, not appropriately qualified and trained, performing procedures on animals maintained and studied by registrants 
can cause harm or death. 
Persons performing procedures on animals being maintained and studied must be appropriately qualified and trained. 
To be corrected: September 8th, 2025, and going forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
